verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, Concerning the <S%H4150>feasts<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H853><s%> ye shall <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> to be <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocations,<s%> even <S%H428>these<s%> are my <S%H4150>feasts.<s%>

Six <S%H8337><s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall <S%H4399>work<s%> be <S%H6213>done:<s%> but the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> is the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of <S%H7677>rest,<s%> a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation;<s%> ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> therein: <S%H1931>it<s%> is the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4186>dwellings.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H4150>feasts<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> even <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocations,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye shall <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> in their <S%H4150>seasons.<s%>
In the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> day of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H996>at<s%> <S%H6153>even<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H6453>passover.<s%>

And on the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2088>same<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> is the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> ye must <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread.<s%>

In the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> ye shall <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation:<s%> ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> therein.

But ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%> in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> is a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation:<s%> ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> therein.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3588>When<s%> ye be <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> unto you, and shall <S%H7114>reap<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> thereof, then ye shall <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H6016>sheaf<s%> of the <S%H7225>firstfruits<s%> of your <S%H7105>harvest<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the priest: <S%H3548><s%>

And he shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6016>sheaf<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to be <S%H7522>accepted<s%> for you: on the <S%H4480>morrow<s%> <S%H4283><s%> after the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> it.

And ye shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> when ye <S%H5130>wave<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6016>sheaf<s%> a he <S%H3532>lamb<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> thereof shall be <S%H8147>two<s%> tenth <S%H6241>deals<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor:<s%> and the drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> thereof shall be of <S%H3196>wine,<s%> the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of a <S%H1969>hin.<s%>

And ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> nor parched <S%H7039>corn,<s%> nor green <S%H3759>ears,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H2088>selfsame<s%> <S%H6106><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H5704>that<s%> ye have <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H853><s%> an <S%H7133>offering<s%> unto your <S%H430>God:<s%> it shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4186>dwellings.<s%>

And ye shall <S%H5608>count<s%> unto you from the <S%H4480>morrow<s%> <S%H4283><s%> after the <S%H7676>sabbath,<s%> from the <S%H4480>day<s%> <S%H3117><s%> that ye <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6016>sheaf<s%> of the wave <S%H8573>offering;<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> complete: <S%H8549><s%>

Even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H4480>morrow<s%> <S%H4283><s%> after the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> shall ye <S%H5608>number<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> and ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Ye shall <S%H935>bring<s%> out of your <S%H4480>habitations<s%> <S%H4186><s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H3899>loaves<s%> of <S%H8147>two<s%> tenth <S%H6241>deals:<s%> they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour;<s%> they shall be <S%H644>baked<s%> with <S%H2557>leaven;<s%> they are the <S%H1061>firstfruits<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H6499>bullock,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams:<s%> they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> with their meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and their drink <S%H5262>offerings,<s%> even an offering made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> of <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Then ye shall <S%H6213>sacrifice<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>kid<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> for a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> them <S%H5921>with<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of the <S%H1061>firstfruits<s%> for a wave <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3532>lambs:<s%> they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

And ye shall <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> on the <S%H2088>selfsame<s%> <S%H6106><s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that it may <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%> unto you: ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> therein: it shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4186>dwellings<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

And when ye <S%H7114>reap<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> of your <S%H776>land,<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> make clean <S%H3615>riddance<s%> of the <S%H6285>corners<s%> of thy <S%H7704>field<s%> when thou <S%H7114>reapest,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shalt thou <S%H3950>gather<s%> any <S%H3951>gleaning<s%> of thy <S%H7105>harvest:<s%> thou shalt <S%H5800>leave<s%> them unto the <S%H6041>poor,<s%> and to the <S%H1616>stranger:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> In the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> in the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> shall ye <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H7677>sabbath,<s%> a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> of blowing of <S%H8643>trumpets,<s%> a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation.<s%>
Ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> therein: but ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Also <S%H389><s%> on the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> there shall be a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3725>atonement:<s%> it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%> unto you; and ye shall <S%H6031>afflict<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H5315>souls,<s%> and <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> in <S%H2088>that<s%> <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3725>atonement,<s%> to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> you <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> it be <S%H834>that<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> in <S%H2088>that<s%> <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> he shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from among his <S%H4480>people.<s%> <S%H5971><s%>

And <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> it be <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H6213>doeth<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> in <S%H2088>that<s%> <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> will I <S%H6>destroy<s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H7130><s%> his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605>manner<s%> of <S%H4399>work:<s%> it shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4186>dwellings.<s%>

It <S%H1931><s%> shall be unto you a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of <S%H7677>rest,<s%> and ye shall <S%H6031>afflict<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H5315>souls:<s%> in the <S%H8672>ninth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%> at <S%H6153>even,<s%> from <S%H4480>even<s%> <S%H6153><s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H6153>even,<s%> shall ye <S%H7673>celebrate<s%> your <S%H7676>sabbath.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> shall be the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tabernacles<s%> for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

On the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation:<s%> ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> therein.

Seven <S%H7651><s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%> unto you; and ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a solemn <S%H6116>assembly;<s%> and ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> therein.

These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H4150>feasts<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H853><s%> ye shall <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> to be <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocations,<s%> to <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> a burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and a meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice,<s%> and drink <S%H5262>offerings,<s%> every <S%H1697>thing<s%> upon his <S%H3117>day:<s%> <S%H3117><s%>

Beside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H905><s%> the <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H4480>beside<s%> <S%H905><s%> your <S%H4979>gifts,<s%> and <S%H4480>beside<s%> <S%H905><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5088>vows,<s%> and <S%H4480>beside<s%> <S%H905><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your freewill <S%H5071>offerings,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye <S%H5414>give<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Also <S%H389><s%> in the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> when ye have gathered <S%H622>in<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8393>fruit<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> ye shall <S%H2287>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H2282>feast<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%> on the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be a <S%H7677>sabbath,<s%> and on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be a <S%H7677>sabbath.<s%>

And ye shall <S%H3947>take<s%> you on the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H6529>boughs<s%> of <S%H1926>goodly<s%> <S%H6086>trees,<s%> <S%H3709>branches<s%> of palm <S%H8558>trees,<s%> and the <S%H6057>boughs<s%> of <S%H5687>thick<s%> <S%H6086>trees,<s%> and <S%H6155>willows<s%> of the <S%H5158>brook;<s%> and ye shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And ye shall <S%H2287>keep<s%> it a <S%H2282>feast<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> in the <S%H8141>year.<s%> It shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> in your <S%H1755>generations:<s%> ye shall <S%H2287>celebrate<s%> it in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>

Ye shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H5521>booths<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that are <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> <S%H249>born<s%> shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in booths: <S%H5521><s%>

That <S%H4616><s%> your <S%H1755>generations<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> I <S%H853>made<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H5521>booths,<s%> when I brought them <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>declared<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4150>feasts<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
